page.title: 06Life Styles _a typical day
page.content: At 6.20am my Dad gets up, he goes to work at 7am. At 8am the alarm goes off and we get up. At 8.10 my mam makes Deborahs mine and her own breakfast then we all get dressed. I'm the first one in the bathroom. At 8.55 we go to school, at 9 we all go in. In the morning we do maths and english then we go for dinner. After dinner we do some sort of topic work. At 3.30 my mam comes for us to go home. When I get home I play the piano. Between 5.00 and 5.30 my Dad comes home from work then we have our tea. After tea we go out to play until 8.30 then we watch T.V for half an hour before going to bed. While we are out playing mum and dad watch T.V, they go to bed at 11.00.
